our worst day in government," a senior aide from David Cameron 's Downing Street office told The Guardian, after Andy Coulson quit as chief of communications on Friday. Donald Rumsfeld takes particular offense at Powell's contention that he was misled by faulty intelligence into making the public case for the invasion of Iraq. Bush did not lie.[ CIA Director George W. Bush ] Tenet did not lie. Condoleezza Rice did not lie. I did not lie.... The far less dramatic truth is that we were wrong. Even so, Donald Rumsfeld - who does reveal that George W. Bush asked for Iraq invasion plans within days of 9/11- argues that removing Hussein was the right thing to do.
